data.title: Wonderful Pizza
data.text: We always stop at Pazzo Pizza when in Lexington - have thought of making the 3 hour trip just to get Pazzo!!

data.title: great atmosphere and the pizza is good
data.text: Great Pizza/ bar across from UK campus. food is always good and several bars inside to watch the game at. Also within walking distance of several other local bars and a short cab/trolley ride to downtown. Its one of the places I take friends from out of town when they come to visit.

data.title: Skip the Pie, Stick with Beer
data.text: The beer was cold, the pizza pie forgettable.  Ever bite of my pizza was dough dough and more dough.  Every bite of my pizza was overwhelmed by the taste of flour.  I ordered some strong toppings on my pie, it lacked sauce and the dough flour flavor masked the flavor of my favorite pizza toppings.  Service was adequate, she, however was more interested in visiting with her friends/coworkers at the top level of the bar than our lower level  table.  Also, don't order the pretzels.  They are just pizza dough twisted into a pretzel shape and sort of baked.  They appeared to me to be a mellow mushroom knock off.  I am sure that this place is very popular because of the vast and wide variety of beer.  Enjoy your beer, but skip the pizza pie!
